body.sql: SELECT a.days, a.total, b.ip FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(req_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') days, count(1) total FROM blog_request_log WHERE req_blog = ? GROUP BY days ORDER BY days DESC ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT days, count(1) ip FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(req_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') days, req_ip FROM blog_request_log WHERE req_blog = ? GROUP BY days, req_ip ) x GROUP BY days ) b ON a.days = b.days
SELECT count(*) value, max(b.website_title) name FROM blog_request_log a INNER JOIN blog_website b ON a.req_blog = b.website_name GROUP BY req_blog
SELECT b.agent_browser_name name, count(*) value FROM blog_request_log a inner JOIN base_agent b ON a.req_agent = b.agent_key GROUP BY b.agent_browser_name
select DATE_FORMAT(article_pubtime,'%Y-%m-%d') days,count(*) total from blog_article <#if websiteid??> where websiteid=? </#if> GROUP BY days order by days desc

select a.req_url,a.req_method,a.req_ip,a.req_run_time,b.agent_browser_name,b.agent_browser_version,b.agent_os,b.agent_device,a.req_datetime,a.req_blog from blog_request_log a left join base_agent b on a.req_agent=b.agent_key
select max(b.website_title) name,count(*) value from blog_article a left join blog_website b on a.websiteid=b.id group by a.websiteid

select count(*) total from blog_request_log a left join base_agent b on a.req_agent=b.agent_key where req_blog='kingschan' and req_ip <> '127.0.0.1' and( b.agent_device='Computer' or b.agent_device='Mobile' or b.agent_device='Tablet')
UPDATE blog_article a inner join (select c_article_id,count(*) total from blog_article_comment where c_isdel='√' group by c_article_id) b on a.id=b.c_article_id set a.article_total_comment=b.total

SELECT user_profile_img img, DATE_FORMAT(user_lastlogin, '%Y.%m.%d') lastlogin, user_level lv, user_screen_name sname, user_url url, site.website_tagline tagline, DATE_FORMAT( site.website_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d' ) datetime, c.w_article_quantity article, c.w_category_quantity category, c.w_lable_quantity lables, c.w_discuss_quantity discuss, c.w_request_quantity req FROM blog_user LEFT JOIN blog_website site ON site.webiste_creator = blog_user.id LEFT JOIN blog_statistical_site c ON site.id = c.id WHERE user_name = ?
select req_blog,count(*) from blog_request_log a left join base_agent b on a.req_agent=b.agent_key where b.agent_device <> 'Unknown' group by req_blog
select LEFT(REPLACE(req_url,'/entry/',''),32) url,count(*) total from blog_request_log where req_url REGEXP '^/entry/[a-z0-9]{32}' group by req_url,req_ip order by total desc

update blog_article a inner join ( select LEFT(REPLACE(req_url,'/entry/',''),32) aid,count(*) total from blog_request_log where req_url REGEXP '^/entry/[a-z0-9]{32}' group by req_url,req_ip ) b on a.id=b.aid set a.article_viewcount=b.total

select * from ( select a.id ,article_title title ,b.article_summary text, article_updatetime time,'' site,'article' type from blog_article a inner join blog_article_text b on a.id=b.id where article_creator=:userid UNION all select b.id,b.article_title ,a.c_text ,a.c_datetime,c.website_name ,'comment' type from blog_article_comment a left join blog_article b on a.c_article_id=b.id left join blog_website c on a.c_website_id=c.id where a.c_user_id=:userid and a.c_isdel='√' UNION all select b.id,b.article_title,'',a.createtime time,c.website_name,'like' type from blog_article_likes a left join blog_article b on a.article_id=b.id left join blog_website c on b.websiteid=c.id where a.userid=:userid ) x order by time desc

insert into blog_statistical_site select site.id as id, u.id uid, site.website_datetime as createDateTime, IFNULL(u.user_lastlogin,now()) as lastLoginDateTime, article.total as articleTotal, category.ctotal as categoryTotal, IFNULL(lable.ltotal ,0) lableTotal, IFNULL(comments.comtotal ,0) commentTotal, request.reqTotal from blog_website site inner join blog_user u on u.id=site.webiste_creator left join( select websiteid,count(1) total from blog_article group by websiteid ) article on article.websiteid=site.id left join (select count(1) ctotal,category_websiteid from blog_category group by category_websiteid)category on category.category_websiteid=site.id left join (select count(1) ltotal,websiteid from (select websiteid,lable_name from blog_label group by lable_name) x group by websiteid ) lable on lable.websiteid=site.id left JOIN (select count(1) comtotal,c_website_id from blog_article_comment where c_isdel='√' group by c_website_id ) comments on comments.c_website_id=site.id left join (select req_blog,count(1) reqTotal from blog_request_log a left join base_agent b on a.req_agent=b.agent_key where agent_device <> 'Unknown' and agent_os <> 'Unknown' and agent_browser_name<>'Robot/Spider' group by req_blog) request on request.req_blog=site.website_name
